thread.title: To boost privacy, Yahoo Mail eliminates need for passwords
thread.title_full: To boost privacy, Yahoo Mail eliminates need for passwords - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Marissa Lang
title: To boost privacy, Yahoo Mail eliminates need for passwords
text:
Photo: Brandon Chew, The Chronicle A pedestrian walks under the Rockridge BART Station passing a Yahoo ad in Oakland, California, on Tuesday, July 14, 2015. A pedestrian walks under the Rockridge BART Station passing a Yahoo...
Yahoo wants passwords to die, and it’s striking the first blow. A pedestrian walks under the Rockridge BART Station passing a Yahoo ad in Oakland, California, on Tuesday, July 14, 2015. A pedestrian walks under the Rockridge BART Station passing a Yahoo...
Yahoo wants passwords to die, and it’s striking the first blow.
